SELECT b_member.`b_member_id`, b_member.`b_member_name`, b_member.`b_member_tel`, b_member.`b_member_status`, b_member.`b_member_level`, b_member.`b_member_address`, b_member.`xt_provinceID`, b_member.`xt_cityID`, b_member.`xt_districtID`, b_member.`b_member_sex`, b_member.`b_member_pwd`, b_member.`b_member_email`, b_member.`b_member_qq`, b_member.`b_member_wb`, b_member.`b_member_type`, DATE_FORMAT(b_member.`b_member_ctime`,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS `b_member_ctime`, DATE_FORMAT(b_member.`b_member_mtime`,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS `b_member_mtime`, xt_province.`NAME` AS xt_provinceName, xt_city.`NAME` AS xt_cityName, xt_district.`NAME` AS xt_districtName FROM b_member b_member LEFT JOIN xt_area_region xt_province ON b_member.xt_provinceID = xt_province.ID LEFT JOIN xt_area_region xt_city ON xt_city.ID = b_member.xt_cityID LEFT JOIN xt_area_region xt_district ON xt_district.ID = b_member.xt_districtID WHERE 1=1
AND instr(b_member.b_member_name,#{b_member_name})
AND b_member.b_member_type = #{b_member_type}
AND instr(b_member.b_member_tel,#{b_member_tel})

SELECT `b_member_id`, `b_member_name`, `b_member_tel`, `b_member_status`, `b_member_level`, `b_member_address`, `xt_provinceID`, `xt_cityID`, `xt_districtID`, `b_member_sex`, `b_member_pwd`, `b_member_email`, `b_member_qq`, `b_member_wb`, `b_member_type`, DATE_FORMAT(`b_member_ctime`,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS `b_member_ctime`, DATE_FORMAT(`b_member_mtime`,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS `b_member_mtime` FROM b_member WHERE b_member_id=#{b_member_id}
